website_summaries.verdict: A great everyday option. Choose these if your dining room table needs a touch of subtle color.
pros: Cross woven vinyl looks like fabric, but is much easier to maintain
Offers decent heat resistance for warm plates and cups
Comes in a range of attractive colors and patterns

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: It ruined my 3000.00 dollar table I sent them back within a couple days they weren’t heat resistant as it said
customer_reviews.author: Judy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect placemats
customer_reviews.text: This placemats are great. They look nice and are sturdy enough for my 2 year old. Exactly as pictured. Easy to clean. I had cloth ones and they never looked right after washing. Buy these!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!  No Creases!
customer_reviews.text: My placemats just arrived. I love the colors. They look great for a great price! Some previous comments said they came rolled up or with a crease that took a couple days to get out, but mine came flat. No creases! I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: S. Jones

customer_reviews.title: slippery but nice. I like the looks but dam the things ...
customer_reviews.text: slippery but nice. I like the looks but dam the things move around on a table. I have a nice dark wood table that i prefer to use with out a table cloth to show off the wood. these complement the table wonderfully, looking really great. but they do move around a lot. I think I need something to put between these and the table to hold them in place.
customer_reviews.author: jerry d

customer_reviews.title: I was concerned these might not look as nice as our cloth placemats
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned these might not look as nice as our cloth placemats. I was wrong! They are lovely on the table and clean up Very easily! Liquids just sort of pool on the top (would probably soak through eventually), so there is plenty of time to mop up spills before they end up on the table.
customer_reviews.author: C. Larson

customer_reviews.title: They were a great price and almost exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: They were a great price and almost exactly what I was looking for. (The color isn't as I expected but I think it's more the lighting in my dining room). We often have friends for dinner (family of 6) and added to our family of 6 it's nice to have matching placemats at a good price. They really don't slide on the table once plates are on them. They are super easy to clean too and I think they will last us a long time. Often times when cleaning placemats the coloring wipes off and stains remain. With this material I don't believe that will occur.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Eh....would not buy them again....
customer_reviews.text: Nice color, well made, but hard to clean. Not what I would call 'heat resistant' though. The mats are fine, but they sure didn't protect my table from warm plates. The first time we used them, just a normal meal at a normal temperature, and the wood underneath them was ruined. Maybe it's my misunderstanding, but I wouldn't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Julie W.

customer_reviews.title: Looks quite nice
customer_reviews.text: The fairly coarse weave and sheen of the material look similar to artificially colored natural materials ... does not look like plastic. Haven't had them long enough to really judge durability, but they look well made.
customer_reviews.author: J. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Super dissapointed. I don't understand all the amazing reviews. Placemats should protect the table and make cleanup easier. These have holes, so anything liquid goes straight through them. Also, they stain really easily. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Christoph Lubenau

customer_reviews.title: Not very stain resistant
customer_reviews.text: We bought the light blue and they are a great color, but far from stain resistant. My daughter got some spaghetti sauce on the mat at dinner. We washed the mat with dish detergent and scrubbed, but the stain didn't budge. Also tough to clean because the mats are woven. So drips and other stuff can get into the texture. Wish we would've gotten a darker color.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Bierly

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure how they were going to look with my rust color chairs but they look really good in the runner I put on the buffet over to the side so that works out really well I just need a centerpiece to make it look nicer than what it is these are great. The color is so nice and it blends in really well with the beige chopper on the table.. I'm not wealthy but I tried my best to have my home livable and pray at the same time
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality, look amazing
customer_reviews.text: Placemats arrived in a timely fashion. Upon opening the package though, they were rolled up so they wouldn’t lay flat. I put them under a heavy box for a few days before I put them out on my dining table. Very good quality, look amazing. However, these do not wipe clean. I already have two stains on one (from hot sauce and ketchup) and they do not come off. They soak in the stain and stay that way. No cleaner would remove the stains. A little annoyed bc they really are beautiful placemats, just don’t drop food\sauce on them!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle A.

customer_reviews.title: Cute for summer and spring
customer_reviews.text: The red and purple weave is very pretty on my dark wood table. I am really happy with the value and appearance. I don't think this would be good for very hot food but I have trivets to supplement the heat resistance. For example, I would directly put a cup of tea or coffee on it but not a hot bowl of soup. It took about 5 minutes to flatten out the pieces but it was worth it! I would recommend these for outdoor tables as well because they'd look great there too. A nice bumper for a glass table.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Look great, work well with spills - clean up is a breeze.
customer_reviews.text: These placemats look great, are easy to clean and I’m very pleased with them. Not sure how durable they will be long term (I’ve only had them on the table for a few weeks), but so far they seem like they will stand the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: eileen n.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, and look better in person than on the screen!
customer_reviews.text: Was a treat to open the package and see that I had made a very good selection. While they have worked very well for the wife and I, a visit by the grandkids has shown that material lodged deep into the texture can be a challenge to clean out. The large size catches plenty of crumbs! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. It changes colors when you look at diferant ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. It changes colors when you look at diferant Angles. Don't buy it if you don't want that. We cut the corners round with sissors. Doesn't fray. They are plastic. So you can clean them. They are flexible and you can roll them up if you want.
customer_reviews.author: true rating

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually do reviews but these placemats were very disappointing. I realize colors can look different but these are much darker than I expected, not very pretty. Also,the packaging was great,so I have no idea how they got a big crease in them but,they did...all six of them looked like they had been folded in half lengthwise. I don't know if I can get it out,maybe put them in hot water?? Anyway...not happy. O yes,they slide around.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: They were pretty in the beginning, but when something spilled into them it had to be wiped IMMEDIATELY or else it stained the print. And its vinyl, not actual fabric. Like, I would scrub with soap and hot water after my kids ate a meal and the stain would've already set. Whether it was milk, juice, food, whatever even just accidentally dropped onto it. Eventually we had to throw them away cuz they began to mold when I couldnt scrub food out of the weaves in the vinyl. I would say good for decoration, but not normal everyday use
customer_reviews.author: Kayla K.

customer_reviews.title: Decorative not functional
customer_reviews.text: I received these placemats yesterday and they are very nice looking but a little on the smaller side. I have had other placemats that are larger on average. These really are not functional as they will not protect your table from heat or spills. They really are more for decoration than anything. They do look nice on the table; but they are not a functioning placemat.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Buedel

customer_reviews.title: Good mats
customer_reviews.text: These mats are good. They don’t stay in place which is my only real complaint...but they are better than the cloth ones I had before. They are textured so they clean up but with a little extra elbow grease to get into the crevices. We set hot plates on them and they don’t melt or get discolored. And so far they are standing tough against a 4 year old and the occasional naughty kitty who gets on the table to slide them onto the floor. Overall, these are better than the cloth ones that never come back out of the washer the same and for the price, I can’t complain too much.
customer_reviews.author: DMM

customer_reviews.title: Not heat resistant!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these specifically for heat resistance for my brand new table. They are not heat resistant at all! I have white marks all over my table. The only thing I place on them is plates or bowls when we are eating dinner. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: HEATHER LEE

customer_reviews.title: It’s easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table placemats because it’s easy to clean and I love the color also. This placemats and table runner cross weaved by non slip PVC material, durable runners, free cutting, and you can bending this placemats still the same form It looks like long lasting with daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn/claire

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and good quality
customer_reviews.text: The set looks nice and sturdy. The smell is light, barely noticeable. The actual color is darker than on the images, I bet the final look depends on how light or dark your table is. I especially like that the placemats are less prone to creasing compared to my other placemats. I let them lie flat and they relax while for my other matts I have to barricade a pile of books on top to flatten them out. Overall I'm pleased. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Zap-Zap

customer_reviews.title: Do not protect wooden table from heat
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty just like the photo, but did not protect my wooden table from heat damage. After first use I have large white heat damage spots in my table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The colors change depending on position.
customer_reviews.text: These are outdoor mats so absorbency shouldn’t be a star to consider unless you consider an open weave construction, then it’s perfect because it does exactly that. It’s open for a reason. Anyway, I like these mats, the only thing I’d prefer was the color to be stronger. If you set the mats in one direction, you see the color, in the opposing direction, a very light gray. I bought a striped mat with 3 colors of blue. So the captains seats are blue and the other 4 places and the runner are gray by the position of our table. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: JohnCM

customer_reviews.title: They are NOT non slip, despite title
customer_reviews.text: I’m super disappointed with this product. In the title of the product they advertise that these placemats are non slip. This is NOT true. They are just regular vinyl/plastic placemats. The quality is nice and the colors are true to the picture shown. However, the whole reason I purchased these was for the fact that they were supposed to be non slip. I will not be purchasing from this misleading seller again.
customer_reviews.author: MINDY T.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t put anything really hot on these so I can’t say if they are heat resistant, but they are made of PVC, so I wouldn’t change it. However, I will say this, they are perfect! I love them! They are easy to clean, they are a great size, don’t let the sweat (condensation) from glasses go through to my table and they look great. I will go back to this supplier when I decide to change colors. I love these!
customer_reviews.author: JAAWN

customer_reviews.title: Our "everyday" placemats
customer_reviews.text: Kids had graduated from "kid" placemats and we wanted something that would look nice but still hold up to periodic mashing of butter into the placement. The runner that provided a bit of heat protection for our table was a bonus. Overall, very pleased with this purchase. It's a great value and looks as nice as it does in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Halavais

customer_reviews.title: Good product, does what its supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: The runner is really long so I used it on my dresser instead, the placemats look beautiful on my wood dining table. I made a super hot casserole and there were no marks on the table. They wiped right up with a wet dishcloth. Overall these are a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Wombacker

customer_reviews.title: Love These Placemats
customer_reviews.text: We usually have a full table at dinner of 6 people including kids. These placemats are beautiful and easy to clean. As you know when you have kids sometimes things get a little messy. These are very easy to clean and perfect size for the plate, silverware, glass and napkin. Would highly recommend these to anyone including family with kids.
customer_reviews.author: CMark1

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: These are nice place mats. They are well made and sturdy. The color scheme is very nice. Be careful about what you get on them because it may be hard to remove. I cannot comment about the heat resistance since it has not been tested or about the durability since I have just recently received them.
customer_reviews.author: road runner

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bargain, that looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 sets of runners and placemats. One for each of my tables and sideboards. They look great and work fantastic. Because they give you the placemats, I have plenty for even a extra card table if nessesary. Everything can be whipped clean and still looks like cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Omami

customer_reviews.title: Food will get stuck in the weave.
customer_reviews.text: I should have read more reviews. These are woven so food particles and liquid will go through which defeats their purpose. They are also not heat resistant and slide all over the place. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kerns

customer_reviews.title: Why are these placemats advertised as 'non-slip'??
customer_reviews.text: First, let me say that these are beautiful placemats, they match my decor perfectly, however, the seller should NOT advertise these as 'non-slip', clearly they are and do slip; the advertising is misleading and does not represent the item. If you're looking for non-slip placemats, DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: The color is vibrant, the fabric appears durable and they're good for everyday use. The fact that they are supposed to be heat resistant is a real plus, but I'd keep them away from a stove or fire. Also, I must add that I have a fabric placement beneath them because otherwise they seem rather thin.
customer_reviews.author: city girl

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to any table surface!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the brown for my mother's coffee table and she loves it. Keeps her coffee table clean from ring marks and easy to keep clean. Non-slip refers to the top and not to the bottom of runner. It will slide, so need to put something on it to keep in place, but well worth the price. Seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Bon924

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty, but not durable
customer_reviews.text: They are very pretty and the color really complements the color scheme in my dining room. However, the edges easily fray. All the mats are already starting to become unwoven. I purchased them two months ago and have been very careful with how I care for them, but the edges are still starting to stick out.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Tate

customer_reviews.title: Rugged
customer_reviews.text: These mats look different colors in different light. I was somewhat concerned until I realized this. I’m using them outdoors under an umbrella so their chameleon quality affects their appearance. That being said I do like them & their ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Food/liquid gets stuck in holes and does not come out.
customer_reviews.text: If I had still been in the return window I would have sent these back. The holes allow liquid to seep through and anything caught in the holes cannot be cleaned out. I scrubbed and tried cleaning in different ways, but no matter how many times I have cleaned them they still look dirty. Really disappointed since these are a cute design, just not practical for using when eating.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Lovely mats
customer_reviews.text: Loved these mats. So thankful they didn’t arrive folded like in other people’s case. The price is good for the 6 mats.
customer_reviews.author: krlcrdv

customer_reviews.title: Stains easily
customer_reviews.text: Within a minute of having marinara sauce spilled on it, the stain became impossible to scrub out. Warm, soapy water and a sponge and brush could not remove it. So disappointed since they are brand new and the whole point was to have easy-clean placemats.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great quality washable placemats
customer_reviews.text: Love these placemats - perfect choice for my kitchen decor. They clean with a quick swipe of a dishcloth and are well-made. Note that the placemats look different when seeing them from different angles (see pics).
customer_reviews.author: Karen R

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful texture and colors
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful lightweight placemats for everyday use, although they are elegant enough to grace a more formal table setting. I did not rate "heat resistance" as I would place anything piping hot on a trivet or oven mitt, not on these lovely placemats.
customer_reviews.author: M. Frazho

customer_reviews.title: very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is very thin and everything goes right through it, No good for the table as it does not protect it. Just received today and used tonight and it is not good. The edges will pick your arm as they are rough. returning
customer_reviews.author: Edna Tollison

customer_reviews.title: GREAT placemats!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these placemats! This is my second set. I had to get blue to update colors for my new house. I can wash these in the sink with my dish wand & air dry & that is all it takes to keep them clean. My first set has lasted for years (they are at least 5 years old) & they still have life in them! I’m hoping my new set hold up as well 😊
customer_reviews.author: Erin Dunagan

customer_reviews.title: Great functional decor!
customer_reviews.text: I hosted Thanksgiving this year and was looking for some placemats that looked nice but would be easy to clean. I found these and was thrilled with the price. I ordered them in Gold and have kept them on the table year round. They are beautiful and so simple to keep clean. I may buy more in other colors once we move. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Too dark for a dark wooden table. Also just a little unattractive.
customer_reviews.text: Got the reddish tint ones. Sent them back after seeing them in person. They were too dark and just not very pretty in my opinion. They blended in to our dark wood dining room table and you could barely see them in contrast. They would probably only work well with a very light colored table. Seemed to be good quality and durable but just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for its high rating. Well, it is not good to me. very very difficult to clean. you can not just wipe it. You have to wash it and wash carefully ! I do not like this product and I will not recommend it to anyone .
customer_reviews.author: wenting zhuang

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Table Mats
customer_reviews.text: Mats were used immediately upon receiving them. They proved to be of excellent quality as they complimented the décor of the dining table setting, as well as resisting hot plates. I would highly recommend them for future buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Salih

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with my purchase. They are easy to clean and the color is what I was expecting. My only complaint is that the table runner is folded in half and then rolled up with the placemats for shipping. This left a heavy crease in the table runner and I wasn’t able to use it as I had originally planned as it took some work to get the crease out.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger C

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for. They look great, easy to clean and stay where they are supposed to stay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: The is a very nice set. Easy to clean. I don’t know if it’s heat resistant. Haven’t tried putting anything hot in it. I got many compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Ehasz

customer_reviews.title: Dinner time
customer_reviews.text: Loving these for our dining room table. The mats we had prior let steam hit the wood of the table and started making imprints on the table. These are working fantastic and they feel nice, also love the color.
customer_reviews.author: William White

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! They look great, I ordered a striped red variety. I have a ebony table and it really sets it off. They change color and intensity depending on your angle. They are easy to clean, important because I have two kids.
customer_reviews.author: Joni

customer_reviews.title: Elegant looking
customer_reviews.text: Elegant looking in the dining table. Easy to clean. Looks like it will lay a very long time. Water sips through it to the table though but all in all it is good especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: Daizy

customer_reviews.title: Too green
customer_reviews.text: Not true to color in the image advertised. A lot more green in these placemats than blue. Rather disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Luv

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my decor.
customer_reviews.text: Loved these casual placemats. Casual dinner party for 10 people. Put them on my nice dining table with fall table decor, they were perfect. Color is a brownish red . Everyone commented on them!!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Convenient cleanable table cover but be hyperaware of tomato sauce.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to use instead of a table cloth. It's easier to pull off, shake out, and wipe down, rather than running a load of laundry. However as I read in other reviews tomato sauces definitely stain and I haven't been able to remove the resulting spots. If you wipe it up immediately it isn't as noticeable but don't leave it until after dinner. But overall for the amount of use I am getting I think it is worth the price, but I wouldn't recommend if your messy eaters favorite meal is spaghetti.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.A2

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: No problems so far. Very easy to clean and no marks on my wood table. Very appealing to the eye
customer_reviews.author: Sunieta Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors in these placemats, so rich looking. Some reviewers said they slide around easily but they stay in place on our glass table top. Like the ease of cleaning them. As far as heat resistant, I don’t know yet.
customer_reviews.author: pookiesmom

customer_reviews.title: Just Right !
customer_reviews.text: These mats are precisely as advertised, in fact better than I expected. Rich tones, sturdy, easily washable and look great with the table setting. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: L. D. Rafey

customer_reviews.title: Beware - they stain easily and can’t be cleaned
customer_reviews.text: These stained after tomato sauce got on it. The care instructions say to use warm water and a brush to get stains out, but I scrubbed them immediately after the stain and they did not budge. Really disappointing, especially since there are so many good reviews - but I did see several others saying they stain very easily. I’m returning these!
customer_reviews.author: MLPGP

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: I just received them today. I like they way they look and feel already. The placemats are perfect size but the table runner is a 'smidge' long. But that's okay because if I was to put the leaf in my table, it would be just the right length.
customer_reviews.author: Craig b.

customer_reviews.title: Confusing to strangers
customer_reviews.text: It confuses people that there are holes in the mesh. People keep putting sweaty drinks on them (literally next to the coasters I put on the table). Water will seep through, so it's kinda dumb. But I like the way they look and they're easy to wipe clean.
customer_reviews.author: C. Vonludwig

customer_reviews.title: Look Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful!!! So easy to clean, they look fantastic and so far as I can tell are heat very resistant! I will gladly purchase in other colors!
customer_reviews.author: Lisette S. Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Matches decor perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I used two of these on both of my nightstands - nice cover for imperfect finish on the nightstands and matches the decor. Not waterproof - but I didn't need them for that.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Dax

customer_reviews.title: Not great for protecting wood
customer_reviews.text: These protect from scratches, but that's about it. The mats are not solid, so liquid goes right through and not great for protecting the wood from heat. They do look nice for being plastic though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mother at thanksgiving , mainly for the price , I was very impressed with the way they’re made and how beautiful the colors are . My mom loved them ❤️
customer_reviews.author: D Bender

customer_reviews.title: Good looking basic mat
customer_reviews.text: Not the fanciest but a good price and they look good. I appreciate that the material they are made out of is grippy so they stay flat and don't slip around.
customer_reviews.author: Anarchangel

customer_reviews.title: Great Look
customer_reviews.text: The color scheme was great and they will protect your table from scratches. Any spill will go right through the mat but it can be easily wiped up.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Keep table clean from messiness of small kids
customer_reviews.text: Larger than others I was looking at. Good value. Helps keep table clean having small kids making a mess when they eat. If I could find larger, I would go for larger, but they get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: 高山 忍者

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent to resist heat from the table. Easy to clean. Crumbs can get lodge in the material but a quick rinse will get them right out.
customer_reviews.author: Steph R

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & durable
customer_reviews.text: Love these placemats, really nice looking. Have others in different color. They clean up and stay nice, unlike fabric ones. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sigrid Victor

customer_reviews.title: Will never buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I definitely will not be purchasing these again! My new kitchen table now has these scorch marks on 4 out of the 6 place settings! I'm pretty upset about.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Strong, unpleasant odour that doesn’t go away
customer_reviews.text: I would not order this brand of placemats again. They smell awful! Typically a “new” smell after just opening a package of something tends to dissipate quickly. These still smell! And I’ve tried washing them, airing them out individually on my patio... nothing has worked, they still have a strong, unpleasant odour. Very disappointed because they look cool and are supposed to be washable, durable and heat resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Cute but don't get them dirty
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute but stains do not come off such as pasta sauce or orange juice. Also if food is nearly impossible to clean from between the fibers.
customer_reviews.author: Alesya Tkachenko

customer_reviews.title: They are very easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Dislike that it’s a tiny mesh, not solid. If you spill a little liquid or sauce it will go through onto the table. Also they slide a little on my table. Was hoping they would grip a little more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice color but hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying to clean off the pasta sauce stain, but for the life of me it won't come off. I've tried soaking it overnight in soapy water but still nothing - such a shame, i actually like this placemat.
customer_reviews.author: PagiandScrofa

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty placemats
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors and the nonslip feature on the table makes it a big plus. I use these place mats in my 5th wheel and it really makes my table pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classy placemats
customer_reviews.text: was totally satisfied with these Placemats they are very pretty and make The table looked very classy I am going to only another set
customer_reviews.author: Deb masias

customer_reviews.title: Nice Placemand, Good Value
customer_reviews.text: They look much nicer than I thought they would. The placemats and table runner were very reasonably priced so I was not expecting them to look as good as they do. I have had nice complements on them.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Herring

customer_reviews.title: Attractive
customer_reviews.text: They are more attractive than depicted in the photos. Liked them so much I purchased a second set. Beautiful colors combinations.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not teal
customer_reviews.text: This place mats look nice and are what you would expect from vinyl mats but I was disappointed in the color. They are not teal by my definition. They look like light mint green.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia in Dublin

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: The price of these is such a good deal when you get 4 of them! They are very cute. Spills can be easily wiped off without dealing with staining. The water does go though it however due to the weave of it, but that’s just what it’s made of! Would 100% purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Marie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Subtle
customer_reviews.text: These placemats are very pretty because of the way the subtle colors come together. If you are looking for placemats that scream color, these are not for you. The colors are blended to define the design and don't distract from your dinnerware and table setting. Also, these are easy to clean and you can't ask for better than that.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Panella

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and EASILY cleaned
customer_reviews.text: These are our everyday place mats. Spills are removed in minutes and drying time is fast. They look great and are very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Spak

customer_reviews.title: Love these placement
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! Much higher quality than I expected. Easy to clean. Very elegant for a non linen product. I ordered more for my dining room.
customer_reviews.author: LindaPugh

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had them long, but they're a nice looking mat. Hopefully they'll last a while and will be OK being cleaned, as food/spills do get caught inside the weaving.
customer_reviews.author: 124XL

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this mat for tabletop PROTECTION
customer_reviews.text: Placemats should protect the table and make cleanup easier. I admit I assumed the mats were SOLID but the listing, in all fairness, did state it was weaved material which I did not see. Weaving causes anything liquid to go straight through to the tabletop as well as food; this can cause stains. If you are buying this for tabletop PROTECTION as well as esthetics, don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nice design- Terrible packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, but would be better if they were not rolled to ship! It’s taking me a very long time to get them to lay flat!
customer_reviews.author: LaRoya H. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: They don’t fray, they clean easily and they’re wonderful to look at.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had others made in a similar way fray after a few months, these are way more durable. The colors are beautiful against light and dark wood and a variety of settings, and they clean easily. What more do you want? 👌
customer_reviews.author: Tim Post

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: My kitchen/dining room accent color is red so while I did buy these for fall, I can use them anytime! I have kids so being able to easily clean them is a must. You just wipe them off and yet, they still look nice!
customer_reviews.author: tgriggs13

customer_reviews.title: Nice placemats
customer_reviews.text: color was too dark, not true to what the picture shows. They were nice though, just not the color I needed
customer_reviews.author: Loveda Gail Ewell

customer_reviews.title: appear to be as presented
customer_reviews.text: can not speak to the other factors as have not had them or used them enough
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: I like them but they are so slippery on my table
customer_reviews.text: I like them but they are so slippery on my table. I can't keep them in the same spot.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Bieniek

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love the placemats because the care is simple and the look elegant on the table. Would buy again in a minute when I need a large number.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something nice and practical for my new table. These are great so I ordered them in two colors. Helps prevent water stains on my wood table and goes with the centerpiece.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie N Williams

customer_reviews.title: Stylistically very nice, mesh material doesn't protect the table as well
customer_reviews.text: They look great, but the mesh doesn't really protect the table underneath from food and spills. The good news is that they are really easy to clean-- I just wash them out in the sink with warm water.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy R

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING value!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this kind of placemat at other home stores, and these were every bit as nice and half the price!
customer_reviews.author: RanFan

customer_reviews.title: They look like cloth
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize they were not cloth..very attractive on my table.. wipe up easy.. If they get bent you cannot get that crease out.
customer_reviews.author: alice miller

product_meta.title: Pauwer Placemats Set of 6 for Dining Table Washable Woven Vinyl Placemat Non-Slip Heat Resistant Kitchen Table Mats Easy to Clean (Set of 6, Red)
feature_bullets: Package: Placemats set of 6, Size:18"x12"(45cmx30cm), Material: 70% PVC and 30% Polyester
Protect The Table from scratches and stains, liquid can go through placemats, clean it when finished. No fading, non slip, heat resistant, washable, easy to clean.
Heat Resistant Placemats: The effective insulation of these table placemats could reach to 176°F(80℃), can protect your dining table well.
Washable and Easy to clean: Easy to wipe clean. Hand wash in warm soapy water and wipe dry; if there is stains stuck in the placemat, use a brush and soapy water to clean it. No machine wash.

Perfect addition to your dinner table, good quality placemats with exquisite design and very elegant looking, to add more fun to your kitchen table. Perfect for daily use, good match with dark wood table, glass table, white dining table, wooden farmhouse table, brown dinning table. Great for BBQ ,under your coffee maker, patio, Thanksgiving and Christmas dinner, outside parties and casual kitchen decor.
